# Zika Incidence in Pan-America 

## This scatter plot represents Zika Incidence in Pan-American countries. Select a country on the drop down bar to see number of confirmed cases on the x-axis. Number of confirmed congenital disease cases are represented by varying coloration of points. to view country specific information at a single date, select any point on the plot.
